person.name: Chris
person.interest: Soccer – Favorite team is Barcelona. I love the DC universe – Flash, Arrow, Superman, Batman, etc. I’m a sucker for bobble heads ;) Pokemon was my favorite show growing up. Hanging out by the pool. Play a lot of games on my phone.

person.name: Miguel
person.interest: I’m a car guy, all things tuner. I like to play Basket Ball, Wade-county, Miami Heat. I like horror movies. My dog Sparks has my heart.

person.name: Justin
person.interest: Band nerd here. I love to longboard and I have a large collection of different boards. Swerve Swag is my crews name. I love all things Nintendo, pokemon, Kirby, Zelda are a few of my favorite games.

person.name: Valerie
person.interest: Supernatural is my favorite show right now. I love Disney and my favorite character is Ariel from The Little Mermaid. I like to play my flute from time to time, and my favorite band is Panic at the Disco.

person.name: Kendra
person.interest: I’m a gym junky, I love to work out. Lets go to the beach and get sun burnt! I love to do makeup. I like to go out and party. EDM music is awesome and Martin Garrix is my favorite.
